title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 42-2.12 - Term policy maximum age
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 42-2.12 - Term policy maximum age

State Regulations

No policy of term life insurance shall be issued, renewed or continued beyond the last age in the mortality table for which minimum nonforfeiture values for whole life insurance are determined at the time of the term policy's issue. For a joint life first to die policy, this limitation is applied to the oldest age. For a joint life last to die policy this limitation is applied to the youngest age. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
§§
42-2.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
